text:
Producer-san!
Is the practice room available later?
I think it's free until tonight.

Yes!
Then, I'll make a reservation!

Got it.
...You seem pretty fired up.

Yeah!
It's almost time for the debut of this costume!

I made a promise, Producer-san,
to make the most beautiful flower bloom.

So, I want to give it my all
in everything I can do for that...

Otherwise, I'll be overshadowed
by the allure of the costume!

Hehe...
Well then, I'll do my best!
